name: AsteroidsHD
description: Engage in space-warfare with your friends and foes! Dodge and destroy asteroids while trying to stay alive in multiplayer! Replay value is endless with massive combinations of in-game ship upgrades, modifications, and customization. Destroy Asteroids and Aliens to gain the edge!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: PixelShader 2.0 Compliant Graphics Adapter DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
